TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ParserErrorCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class ParserErrorCollection Inherits CollectionBase
public ref class ParserErrorCollection sealed : System::Collections::CollectionBase

summary.span: 管理在剖析期間偵測到的剖析器錯誤。

span.span: Manages a set of parser errors detected during parsing.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方法和屬性可供您管理的集合物件。The class provides methods and properties that you can use to manage a collection of objects. 比方說，您可以讓剖析器錯誤的一組加入集合時使用自訂時剖析報表所有剖析在剖析期間所攔截的例外狀況的物件。For example, you can add a set of parser errors to a collection upon parsing while using a custom object to report all parse exceptions caught during parsing. 若要新增要移除它們，或在集合中找到它們的剖析器錯誤，請使用下列方法：To add parser errors to, remove them from, or locate them in a collection, use the following: - 方法來加入單一物件加入集合。The method to add a single object to the collection. - 方法來新增多個物件加入集合。The methods to add multiple objects to the collection. - 這兩個方法和屬性，亦即用來新增單一索引子集合中指定索引處的物件。Both the method and the property, which is the indexer, to add a single object to the collection at the specified index. 此外，您可以使用類別來執行下列動作：Additionally, you can use the class to do the following: - 移除具有物件方法。Remove objects with the method. - 檢查是否特定集合中是使用方法。Check whether a particular is in the collection by using the method. - 尋找位置物件集合中尋找使用方法。Find where a object is located in the collection by using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the methods. [!code-csharp[System.Web.ParserErrorCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ParserErrorCollection/CS/ParserErrorCollection_CS.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.ParserErrorCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ParserErrorCollection/VB/ParserErrorCollection_VB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以加入現有物件加入集合。Use the method to add an existing object to the collection. 您無法將相同物件至集合一次以上。You cannot add the same object to the collection more than once. 當您呼叫方法使用會傳回已在集合中，新增會失敗而-1 的物件。When you call the method using a object that is already in the collection, the addition fails and -1 is returned. 若要加入集合中的多個物件，請使用方法。To add multiple objects to the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何新增物件至物件。The following code example demonstrates how to add a object to a object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法將相同物件至集合一次以上。You cannot add the same object to the collection more than once. 不過，嘗試加入物件不只一次不會擲回例外狀況。However, attempting to add a object more than once will not throw an exception. 相反地，新增將會失敗。Instead, the addition will fail. 在此情況下，方法會傳回-1 值。In this case, the method will return a value of -1. 不過，和方法沒有傳回值。However, the and methods do not have return values. 新增時物件，使用其中一種方法中，使用方法，以判斷是否特定物件已經存在集合中。When adding objects by using one of these methods, use the method to determine whether a particular object is already in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何搜尋指定的執行個體物件中物件。The following code example demonstrates how to search for an instance of a specified object in a object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將複製到相容的陣列，指定索引處開始物件集合 （包括其所包含的項目參考） 中。Use the method to copy the objects in a collection (including the item references they contain) to a compatible array, starting at a specified index. 這是很有用，當您想要排序使用集合中的物件方法。This is useful when you want to sort the objects in the collection by using the method. 若要這樣做：To do this: 1. 複製相容的陣列物件。Copy the objects into a compatible array. 2. 排序陣列。Sort the array. 3. 使用方法來移除所有從集合的物件。Use the method to remove all the objects from the collection. 4. 使用方法，將已排序的陣列加入集合。Use the method to add the sorted array back to the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將複製的內容物件，以指定陣列。The following code example demonstrates how to copy the contents of a object to the specified array.
